hero.title: Unveiling the Card Experience
hero.paymentNeeds: The payment needs of major online giants such as AliExpress, Netflix, Facebook-Google Advertising, Amazon, and various other shopping platforms.

about.title: Empowering the Future of Online Transactions
about.mission: We are at the forefront of revolutionizing the way people navigate the digital financial landscape. Our mission is clear: to provide users and entrepreneurs with a secure, efficient, and user-friendly platform for conducting online transactions through virtual credit cards.

features.title: Redefining Online Transactions
features.description: Discover the unparalleled features that make ByCard the go-to platform for secure, convenient, and efficient online transactions. With our virtual credit cards, you can seamlessly shop, subscribe, and transact online, all with just a few clicks.

virtualCards.title: Virtual Credit Cards
virtualCards.description: Say goodbye to the limitations of physical credit cards.

security.title: Cutting-Edge Security
security.description: We employ state-of-the-art encryption and security protocols to ensure your financial data is protected at all times.

fees.title: Transparent Fee Structure
fees.description: It maintains a straightforward fee structure, ensuring you always know what to expect, with no surprises.

interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
interface.description: Our platform boasts an intuitive, user-friendly interface, designed for both beginners and experienced users.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.flow: Flow Our Step For Create Your Account

step1.title: Step 1
step1.subtitle: Sign Up
step1.description: Begin by signing up on the ByCard platform. Provide the required information to create your account.

step2.title: Step 2
step2.subtitle: Loading Funds
step2.description: This can be done through various payment methods, ensuring flexibility and convenience.

step3.title: Step 3
step3.subtitle: Apply Card
step3.description: It mirrors your traditional credit card, allowing you to conduct online transactions securely.

turnkey.title: Turnkey solution
turnkey.description: Launching your card program made easy

borderless.title: Go Borderless
borderless.description: MasterCard, Visa, Unionpay - cards work worldwide without exceptions and sanctions

contactless.title: Contactless payments
contactless.description: Apple Pay and Google Pay puts mobile payments at their fingertips

toMarket.title: Get to market faster
toMarket.description: Launch your card program in weeks
toMarket.details: Accelerate time-to-market with secure sandbox testing, robust API documentation, rapid deployment, dedicated support, and a smooth end-to-end journey.

instantCards.title: Instant card issuance
instantCards.description: Instantly issue virtual or physical cards with our mobile app. Try it now!

testimonials.title: 3+ Customer Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Empowering the Future of Online Transactions
testimonials.description: Explore what our satisfied users have to say about their experiences with it.

businessOwner.title: Small Business Owner
businessOwner.review: As a small business owner, ByCard has been a game-changer. It allows me to offer convenient payment options to my clients while generating an extra revenue stream. The one-time-use codes provide peace of mind, knowing that my transactions are secure. ByCard is a win-win for both my clients and my business.

marketingManager.title: Marketing Manager
marketingManager.review: ByCard has completely transformed the way we handle online transactions in our company. The security features are top-notch, and the ease of generating virtual cards makes our online purchases hassle-free. I highly recommend ByCard to anyone looking for a secure and convenient online payment solution.

shopper.title: Online Shopper
shopper.review: Shopping online has never been this secure and straightforward. ByCard's unique codes make me feel confident about the safety of my transactions. It's like having an extra layer of protection. I can't imagine going back to using my regular card for online purchases. ByCard has won me over!

footer.thanks: Thank you for choosing ByCard as your trusted partner for secure online transactions. We are committed to providing you with a seamless and secure experience.
